traits.name: Shoot the Hostage
effects: The brawler takes half damage from strikes if they have a creature or object grabbed. The grabbed creature or object takes the other half of the damage.

traits.name: Supernatural Insight
effects: The brawler ignores concealment if it’s granted by a supernatural effect, or the target is supernatural.

abilities.name: Haymaker

effects.17+: 12 damage; M<2 grabbed, target has a bane on escaping the grab

effects: brawler deals an additional 2 damage if the target is already grabbed.

abilities.name: Throw
abilities.target: One creature grabbed by the brawler
